general_advisory: Taking the advantage of store soil moisture, farmers should start land preparation for rabi crops like mustard, toria, sunflower and sowing should be completed soon to get optimum yield. Visit the field regularly to observe the infestation levels of pests and diseases. Consult the nearest veterinary doctor for vaccination and deworming in animals.

advisory: Prevailing warm and humid weather may increase the incidence of pests and diseases in rice. Apply suitable pesticides as recommended.

Taking the advantage of store soil moisture, land preparation and sowing of the crop should be completed soon to get optimum yield. Use suitable varieties and follow recommended fertilization practices.
To prevent wilting or partial wilting in brinjal, drain excess water from the field and apply recommended treatments to prevent damage.
Install traps to control vectors and spray recommended insecticides to prevent diseases in coconut and papaya.
After heavy rainfall, test water quality of fish ponds and apply lime as recommended.
Provide mineral mixture and salt regularly to animals. Vaccinate animals against common diseases.
